Home Link: https://www.thesouthafrican.com Category News Link: https://www.thesouthafrican.com/news/

News

Wherever you are in the world, The South African will bring you all the latest news - locally and internationally. We have the latest from parliament as the ANC government moves towards a life after president Jacob Zuma - all while under fire from the Democratic Alliance, EFF and the rest of the SA opposition parties. We'll also keep you in the loop on property news, crime, sport and weather. From the issues that matter on a national scale right down to a local level, we've got you covered right across South Africa with our in-depth coverage.
